r.d: Memcached is a caching daemon designed especially for dynamic web applications to decrease database load by storing objects in memory. This extension allows you to work with memcached through handy OO and procedural interfaces.
r.n: - Added experimental session storage support. You can use memcached as session storage. - Fixed PECL bug #9486 (empty keys should not be allowed in memcache_set/add()) - Fixed PECL bug #9854 (get() changes the datatype of variable of given as key)
